resources.string: Hi, kei te pēhea koe i tēnei rā?
NGĀ TIKANGA TURE O NGĀ MĀTUA
NGĀ TIKANGA TURE O NGĀ KAIAWHINA

Welcome to the MIOK Information App. This app was a requirement for the COMP709 Mobile Application Development Module.\nThis app aims to provide information to parents and caregivers regarding escorting and legal rights. The accompanying app is the MIOK Quick Response App designed for the safety of children at home.

Nau mai ki te Taupānga Mōhiohio MIOK. I hangaia tēnei taupānga hei whakatutuki i te whakaritenga mō te Wāhanga Whakawhanake Taupānga Pūkoro COMP709.\nKo te whāinga o tēnei taupānga, he tuku mōhiohio ki ngā mātua me ngā kaitiaki e pā ana ki te ārahi me ngā motika ā-ture. Ko te taupānga tūhonohono ko te Taupānga Whakautu Tere MIOK i hangaia mō te haumaru o ngā tamariki i te kāinga.
We as Kaitiaki Group of eight students from Wintec.
Ko mātou hei Rōpū Kaitiaki, e waru ngā tauira nō Wintec.

MIOK Quick Response app is designed to ensure the safety of children in emergencies.
 
 - Application ID:
 com.example.miok_quick_response_app
 - Target SDK: 34
 - Minimum SDK: 28
 - Compile SDK: 34
 - Version Code: 1
 - Version Name: 1.0
 - Kotlin Version: 1.8.0
 - Navigation Component Version: 2.7.4
 - Firebase SDK: firebase-firestore-ktx
 - RecyclerView Library: 
 androidx.recyclerview:recyclerview:1.1.0
 - Room Database:
 androidx.room:room-ktx:2.4.2
 - Google Drive API:
 com.google.android.gms:play-services-drive:17.0.0
 - CardView Library:
 androidx.cardview:cardview:1.0.0
 - ConstraintLayout Library:
 androidx.constraintlayout:constraintlayout:2.1.4
 - DrawerLayout Library:
 androidx.drawerlayout:drawerlayout:1.1.1
 - ViewBinding Enabled
 - DataBinding Disabled
 - Test Frameworks:
 JUnit 4.13.2, Espresso 3.6.1
 - Proguard Configuration:
 proguard-android-optimize.txt,
 proguard-rules.pro
 - Kotlin & Java Compatibility:
 JVM Target 1.8

- Ko te taupānga MIOK Quick Response i hangaia mō te haumaru o ngā tamariki.
